scripts.test:build: g++ ./test/output/dynamic.cpp -o ./test/output/dynamic.exe -std=c++23 && g++ ./test/output/values.cpp -o ./test/output/values.exe -std=c++23 && g++ ./test/output/functions.cpp -o ./test/output/functions.exe -std=c++23 && g++ ./test/output/arrow-functions.cpp -o ./test/output/arrow-functions.exe -std=c++23 && g++ ./test/output/mutability.cpp -o ./test/output/mutability.exe -std=c++23 && g++ ./test/output/console.cpp -o ./test/output/console.exe -std=c++23 && g++ ./test/output/void.cpp -o ./test/output/void.exe -std=c++23 && g++ ./test/output/log-function.cpp -o ./test/output/log-function.exe -std=c++23
scripts.test: bun run test:compile && bun run test:build && bun run test:run
